title: AI Agent Deployment Playbook
description: Use this playbook when moving an AI agent from prototype to production. Covers environment isolation, budgeting, human-in-the-loop, and observability.

title: Incident Response Playbook
description: Structured approach to handling production incidents. Covers detection, triage, mitigation, and post-incident review.
